name: Legion of Super Heroes: Mon-El Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Lar Gand.

	Mon-El made his debut in 'Superboy' #89 (1961).  Under the circumstances when they met, Superboy believed him to be a lost brother.  Because they met on "Mon"day, Superboy (Kal-El) gave him the name Mon-El.  It stuck, even after Lar's temporary amnesia wore off.

Daxam.

	Daxam is a planet where some early Kryptonian space explorers settled and civilized.  The birthing matrixes that they took with them had been altered so that newborns were no longer vulnerable to kryptonite, but instead to lead.

questions.text: When Superboy accidentally exposes Mon-El to lead, he is poisoned.  The poisoning doesn't go away when the lead is removed from his vicinity.  What does Superboy do next?
questions.correct: Puts Mon-El in the Phantom Zone until a cure can be found
options: Arranges for Mon-El to be returned to his home planet for treatment.
Travels through time with Mon-El so the Legion can help help him
Admits that he has to ask Lex Luthor for assistance
questions.explanation:
Puts Mon-El in the Phantom Zone until a cure can be found.

	Mon-El ends up spending 1000 years in the Phantom Zone.

questions.text: When Brainiac 5 creates a long term serum to overcome Mon-El's lead poisoning, Mon-El feels the need to audition for the Legion in disguise to make sure he's really worthy or membership.  What name does he audition under?
questions.explanation:
Marvel Lad.

	Under the guise of Marvel Lad, he tells the Legion his real name is Lemon.  Brainiac 5 realizes that Lemon is an anagram of Mon-El, but doesn't give things away.

questions.text: During his Legion audition, Mon-El created a whole new element.  He called it Element 162.  Shortly thereafter Brainiac 5 used Element 162 to create what?
questions.explanation:
Legion flight rings.

	Prior to their Legion flight rings, Legionnaires were issued bulky flight belts.  Prior to that they wore backpack size jet packs.

questions.text: What fellow Legionnaire did Mon-El have a long term romantic relationships with?
questions.explanation:
Shadow Lass.

	Shadow Lass had a tiny crush on Brainiac 5 when she first joined, but began having feelings for Mon-El during an adventure they shared in the past fighting Mordru.

questions.text: In the 5YL (5 year later) continuity, Mon-El's history is dramatically re-written.  In this continuity, he has a long history as a hero in the 20th century prior to his arrival in the 30th century Legion.  What was his hero name in this continuity?
questions.explanation:
Valor.

	In this post 'Crisis on Infinite Earths' chronology, Superman was never Superboy.  So in this continuity, Valor becomes the inspiration upon which the Legion was founded.  Lar had his own self titled comic, 'Valor', that expanded on his exploits in the 20th century.

questions.text: In the post Zero Hour/Reboot continuity, Mon-El again is given a new hero identity that he operates under.  What is it?
questions.explanation:
M'Onel.

	In this continuity, he had originally been the hero known as Valor in the 20th century.  He assisted with the seeding of populations on numerous planets and then disappeared.  He spent a 1000 years in the "stasis zone" until freed by the Legion.  During his time away, he had achieved a god like status among many of the civilizations he helped begin.  Wishing for anonymity, he chose the Martian name M'Onel, which means "he who wanders".  He operated as a "detached" member of this incarnation of the Legion.

questions.text: In the "Retroboot" continuity, Mon-El fills in as the primary protector of Metropolis for a while in the present 21st century.  This was during a period of many months where Superman was off planet on New Krypton.  During this time, Mon-El also served as a member of which super group?
questions.explanation:
The Justice League of America.

	Mon-El was extended membership in the Justice League of America and served briefly.  Eventually he is severely poisoned by lead (again), and he is placed in the Phantom Zone until he is rescued by the Legion of Super Heroes 1000 years later.

questions.text: In the "Retroboot" continuity, after Mon-El is rescued by the Legion on the 31st century, he eventually is chosen to receive even more power than what he already has.  How does he become even more powerful?
questions.correct: He is selected to be a Green Lantern
options: He is bombarded by gamma rays
He flies through a yellow sun
He runs for, and achieves, a high rank in public office.
questions.explanation:
He is selected to be a Green Lantern.

	Mon-El is selected to be a Green Lantern and is given a power ring.  The combined power of the ring, along with his natural Daxamite super powers made him unquestionably one of the mightiest characters in Legion history, if not DC history!
